Definition: In this task, you're given a review from Amazon and a rating for the product on a scale of 1-5. Your task is to determine whether the rating matches the review. If the rating corresponds to the review, answer with "True". If the rating does not correspond to the review, answer with "False".

Positive Examples.input:
Review: These are junk! Both bulbs have burned out within a two month period!! I cannot believe that this company can be in business with such poor quality. I have used infrared lights for my ball python for many years now and I get a varied range of months from a bulb, but I have never gone through two bulbs in a matter of two months! I am very disappointed. 
 Rating: 1
Positive Examples.explanation: The user seems very disappointed in the product because the bulb they ordered has been burned out earlier than usual. So, he gave 1 star to the review considering it extremely poor. So, true is the correct answer.

Positive Examples.input:
Review: Love it! Truth be told, I find regular bras annoying to wear so practically live in sports bras. These caught my eye as providing my cleavage a bit of a boost as well as having a more...attractive look than your typical sports bra. Would I wear it on a jog? No, I really don't think it would provide me comfortable support. But for everyday wear and light activity? Absolutely no complaints. Matter of fact, after buying the black as a test run, I ended up buying every color. 
 Rating: 1
Positive Examples.explanation: The user seems perfectly satisfied with a product where they didn't even have any complaint and they even bought this product again. So, he gave this product 5 stars considering it extremely good. So, 1 is an incorrect answer.

Positive Examples.input:
Review: It's a very nice kit, it came with all the accessories, BUT my waterproof case was broken, the thing that closes it was broken so I can't close the case and now the case is useless. And I bought this kit just because of the waterproof case.... The rest was fine as announced. 
 Rating: 3
Positive Examples.explanation: The user seem very neutral with the product. Because he has some complaints while the product also turned out to be a bit useful too. So, 3 is the correct answer.

Negative Examples.input:
Review: I am disappointed in this purchase. I bought one of these in another color and in size XL and it fit great. This one I bought in white in XL and it fits like a Medium. I cannot wear this top and am really disappointed about that, It is advertised as XL but seriously this top would only fit someone who would be a size s/m. An XXL would have been a better choice for me because the sizing is incorrect on this product. 
 Rating: 1
Negative Examples.explanation: One is a correct rating according to this review. The user seem very dissatisfied with the product because the size didn't fit them. So 1 is the correct rating and True is the correct output.

Negative Examples.input:
Review: I like the vr built in headphones.You need to download 3D app or find 3D videos on You Tube to watch, but it's worth the money.I don't know how to express my word, it is amazing watching video. Well built. 
 Rating: 1
Negative Examples.explanation: The user is saying all the nice things about the VR product which they bought, so they seem satisfied and happy with it. So, 5 stars rating is the correct answer.

Negative Examples.input:
Review: I got this with 50% charge. Put it under the sun. two days later, it has 25%. Never able to charge it once. Should have returned it right away. 
 Rating: 2
Negative Examples.explanation: You're only supposed to answer with true or false.

Instances.input:
Review: Reel causes flat / chewed up places in my line. Gets worse with use. Does not cast well, and gets worse as line condition deteriorates. 
 Rating: 2

Review: For about the same amount I would spend for 8 batteries at a big box store... I got 50 of theses. Quality is great. arrived fast... fresh... date on packages was less than 30 days old. I use these in several items. Installed 4 into a night fishing baseball hat... bright and powerful. Will post a follow-up if these do not last as long as the big name brands. But based on other reviews I think they will. 
 Rating: 1

Review: Hello, The tracking says it was handed off directly to me, but it was NOT handed to me or left at my door. In fact I wasn't even home on Tue when the system states I was. Assistance is needed please. 
 Rating: 1

Review: Used it in birdbath to keep water from being stagnant- put it in my dog’s swimming pool - it’s fun to watch and turns off when water dries out. I recommend this! 
 Rating: 1

Review: Cute item - unfortunately this arrived all bent from the box. They should have shipped in a larger box rather than jamming into a box a hair too small. If it were on a heavier stock paper, perhaps it would not have creased up. Wound up throwing it out. 
 Rating: 2

Review: Sound quality is alright--for about 5 minutes; the headphones volume cuts in half within a few minutes of using, to the point your music is nearly inaudible in a room with ANY noise in it. This is from a FULL battery, mind you. I looked through reviews and didn't see this point, so I'm thinking I may have gotten a defective unit that can't deliver proper voltage from the battery during usage. In any case, I'm very disappointed with my purchase. 
 Rating: 1

Review: I had hoped the colored sleeves would work like a locking bit holder or the button on the back of a ratchet to lock the sockets in place. Not so; the ball in the side of the square drive is properly spring-loaded, but the sockets just pull off as with any less expensive socket adaptors. More important is that they do not properly fit and lock into my impact drivers. I must, therefore, hold the adapter in place for use. 
 Rating: 3

Review: These are the best over the counter readers I have ever bought, and believe me I've bought a "few" Stylish, durable with spring action at a very reasonable $$. HIGHLY recommend! 
 Rating: 1
